title: DWP working to restore power in Hancock Park and Torrance following heat-related blackouts
text: Harriet RyanContact Reporter Crews were working Saturday morning to restore power in sections of Hancock Park and Torrance following heat-related blackouts throughout the Los Angeles area , officials said. In Hancock Park, about 170
